Feature-Based Knowledge Distillation

DL
Knowledge Distillation
paper review
Distillation Loss = 모델의 중간 층의 출력인 Attention map을 MSE Loss를 통해 비교한 Loss 2개 + student model의 Cross entropy Loss 1개

Response-based Knowledge Practice

Large Scale Model → Small Scale Model with Response-based Knowledge
DL
Knowledge Distillation
paper review
▶ T = 2, α = 0.3 일 때 Response-based Knowledge는 최적의 성능을 보임
Distillation을 하지 않은 Student Model보다 0.5% 높은 정확도를 보임
